Reviews.Title: “Nice boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: TheFab75
Reviews.Content: jl 76 nice boutique hotel approx 50 museum district amsterdam busy center walking distance tramway basically basement window ground level view impossible sky unhappy staff sorry couldnt hotel booked promised day 2nd night pack luggage leave morning transferred floor free bottle white wine handwritten apology note service precious luxury dealt perfect otherwise hotel nicely decorated bed comfortable bathrooms nice breakfast buffet possibility lot meals free hotel level price 1 level thats mark 45 5 thanks staff read note

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location, Everything you need”
Reviews.Author: Phil_S_Los_Altos
Reviews.Content: spend enjoyable 7 days jl 76 march immediately impressed decor modern conveniences remodeled building cool booked executive available week stay floor 2 faced hotel quiet heard guest entire stay hotel booked bed bedding exceptionally clean comfortable bathroom fantastic overhead rain shower head found business traveler vacationer safe coffee maker tvs wifi internet noted staff jl 76 extremely friendly helpful anytime questions required assistance front desk concierge desk outstanding fantastic options hotel honor bar relax drink anytime incredibly convenient odd hours keeping trip major plus restaurant incredible pancakes items morning lots options favorite banana pancakes food top notch didnt try meals ate wonderful breakfast morning stayed look packages include breakfast additional savings overall im jl 76 trip booked month april im staying week fantastic home home amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Little Gem”
Reviews.Author: greggles16
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights easily accesible hotel intimate hustle easy walking distance attractions affordable excellent breakfasts bus 197 takes close hotel airport 8euros 2 cheaper hotel shuttle bus taxi info desk helpful beds extremely comfortable 102 functional flat screen tv nespresso coffee selection premium tea vondel park van gogh museum door step designer helpful info refills

Reviews.Title: “Great boutique hotel in quiet area of Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Jo H
Reviews.Content: found hotel via website liked look near museums transport links main central amsterdam lovely view street tv bathroom comfortable bed couldnt fault service friendly helpful breakfasts lots options hotel modern comfortable value enjoyed stay definitely stay hotel time visit short trip 2 nights booked keen sooner highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Extremely comfortable, great location, direct bus from airport”
Reviews.Author: Jose096
Reviews.Content: comfort stayed 4th floor extremely comfortable quiet space amazing bed excellent nespresso machine rooom courtesy coffee tea free wifi internet staff eager help amsterdam breakfast bit expensive hotel common space nice stay location 5 min walking distance rijksmuseum van gogh museum concertgebouw city center 20 min walking distance bus 197 goes directly schiphol airport hotel 35min ride bus stop near rijksmuseum perfect restaurants nearby et les dames pantry

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel, great location!”
Reviews.Author: CXsjr
Reviews.Content: hotel situated upmarket residential easy walking distance museums multitude restaurants designer shopping transport easy reach tram stops lines street arrived hotel midafternoon told allocated executive basement chance move upper floor unfortunately hotel booked read reviews somewhat concerned noisy basement actually found slight downside subterranean style windows middle particularly grey winter spell allow huge amount natural light hotel afternoon chance move following night extremely helpful chap desk quickly obliged allocating top floor following evening move hitch huge panoramic window spanning width affording views rooftops city tastefully decorated reviews mentioned beds extremely comfortable bathrooms exec modern jacuzzi baths rain shower television honesty bar facilities nor breakfast preferred try eateries bars nearby canals hotel provided base short stay definite choice return summer

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful!”
Reviews.Author: elizabeth h
Reviews.Content: husband stayed five nights week christmas 100 beautiful light roomy quiet extremely comfortable bed imho staff couldnt helpful breakfast day yum coffee fantastic location walked week love amsterdam love hotel thanks awesome stay

Reviews.Title: “great”

Reviews.Content: location van gogh trams buses city centre airport similarly close spacious comfortable bed nice coffee facilities nespresso machine tv bathroom nice touch free wifi reasonably fast parking available bit noisy morning

Reviews.Title: “Ok hotel in Amsterdam.”

Reviews.Content: smooth fast checkin friendly polite staff basement extremely noisy staircase toilet hallway houskeeping staff equipment washing machines result noise hours day impossible sleep complained floor including complimentary bottle red wine nice neighborhood surrounded luxury store walking distance city centre recommended street level

Reviews.Title: “Tiny room with HUGE furniture in great location”
Reviews.Author: flowerchat1
Reviews.Content: lovely location 5min walk id booked 30 sqm late checked didnt bother argument front desk 1am stupidly designed considering size arm chairs whats shiny curtains brown color scheme throw chairs window space luggage sink doesnt fit bathroom entrance bathroom spa bath tv water resistant remote tv doesnt hope theyve noticed bed comfortable overall feeling privacy top floor cramped furniture shame hotel cosy homey little updates

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely fantastic hotel in beautiful Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Rachiecakes
Reviews.Content: wonderful lovely hotel stayed 4 nights week christmas amsterdam beautiful hotel situated quiet road excellent access rijksmuseum 2min walk easy walk leidsplein walked amsterdam fabulous location hussle bussle lads loud romantic beautiful gorgeous jacuzzi bath perfect day walking amsterdam towels day week 10 towels lovely coffee machine posh tea bed comfortable nice size thank staff hotel uk helped phonecalls kindness kept immaculate lovely romantic hotel enjoy wonderful beautiful cultural incredible city highly highly recommended thanks xx

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: europe21
Reviews.Content: orginally booked jl sister hotel hotel vondel due spare try stayed executive giant king bed plasma tv jucuzzi bath own tv foot bath nespresso machine breakfast included favourite bacon eggs cereal european ham cheeses location close trams centre amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Arty and modern hotel”
